meanings.definition: The act of caring for children as a nanny.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys nannying for the Smith family on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Her nannying skills have improved since she started working with children.
meanings.sent3: While nannying, she accidentally spilled juice on her own shirt.
meanings.sent4: Nannying is like being a superhero for kids, always there to save the day.
meanings.sent5: The joy of nannying shines through in the laughter of the children.

meanings.definition: The practice or profession of working as a nanny.
meanings.sent1: Her dream job is nannying for a loving family.
meanings.sent2: Nannying requires patience, creativity, and a love for children.
meanings.sent3: She never imagined nannying would lead to so many funny stories.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nannying, every day brings new adventures and challenges.
meanings.sent5: The bond formed through nannying can last a lifetime.
